headline: GE Vernova (GEV) Partners with Verizon for Grid Modernization Platform
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the stocks to buy according to billionaire Ray Dalio’s Bridgewater Associates. On October 3, Verizon announced a partnership with GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) to deliver a grid modernization platform. GE Vernova’s MDS Orbit industrial wireless platform is now available on Verizon’s network, and it will offer utility companies […]

headline: Trick-or-Tech: New Verizon survey reveals how families stay safe and connected on Halloween
summary: Seventy-eight percent of parents see technology as a helpful tool for keeping their kids safe on Halloween.Nine in 10 parents will monitor their trick-or-treaters, with most using a smartphone or wearable devices — and Latino parents are more likely to use this tech than all other parents.Over a third of parents want an SOS button on their child’s device for safer trick-or-treating.Black/African American and Latino parents are more likely to use technology — like phones, smartwatches, and locati

headline: In National Advertising Division Challenge, Verizon Voluntarily Discontinues “Free Google Pixel 10 Pro” Claim

headline: Total Wireless Launches No-Cost Wireless Service for Eligible Californians Through LifeLine Program
summary: IRVINE, Calif., October 16, 2025--Total Wireless, a fast-growing, no-contract wireless provider covered by the Verizon 5G network, today introduced its LifeLine discount program for California residents. Through the California LifeLine program, qualifying customers can receive a Total Wireless plan that includes unlimited talk, unlimited text, and 6GB of high-speed data every 30 days — all for as low as $0 per month. Customers also receive a free smartphone upon enrollment. For those who need mo

headline: Wireless Zone Enters New Era with the Appointment of Al Pellecchia as Executive Vice President
summary: Stepping into a new era, Wireless Zone® has appointed an executive vice president from within its franchise system, longtime franchisee, Al Pellecchia. Under his leadership, the nation's largest Verizon franchisor is poised to continue growing its system through improved processes, prioritizing automation and providing ongoing support for the stores.

headline: Montgomery County and Verizon Frontline Upgrade Public Safety Vehicles
summary: Activate over 600 5G connections for agency vehiclesCONROE, Texas, Oct. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon Frontline today announced the completion of a communications upgrade for several Montgomery County public safety agencies, including the Montgomery County Sheriff’s Office (MCSO), activating over 600 mobile broadband lines to provide 5G connectivity to agency vehicles. headline: Beyond the Hum Shutdown: Bouncie Leads the Way
summary: Bouncie, a leading innovator of connected driving experiences for individuals and small to mid-sized businesses, announced today that it's accelerating efforts to provide a seamless transition for Hum by Verizon users impacted by the recent announcement that Verizon will shut down the Hum platform at the end of 2025.
